@graph.name: Guide on How to Change the Order of Products on Shopify
@graph.description: You can change product order within any Shopify collection. Navigate to a collection and find the “Products” section. From the sort dropdown menu, select the “Manually” option. You can then click and drag products into your desired sequence. Shopify also offers automatic sorting by price, date, or best-selling status. So you want to change the […]

step.name: Access Shopify Admin
step.text: Log into your Shopify admin dashboard

step.name: Navigate to Collections
step.text: On the left, find and click 'Products,' then click 'Collections'

step.name: Select Collection
step.text: Find the collection you want to modify and click its name

step.name: Choose Manual Sorting
step.text: Click the dropdown menu for sorting and choose 'Manually'

step.name: Drag and Drop Products
step.text: Grab the six-dot icon next to any product and drag it to your desired position

step.name: Set Automated Sort
step.text: For automated sorting, select options like 'Best selling' or 'Price: Low to High' from the dropdown

step.name: Save Changes
step.text: For automated sorting, scroll up and hit the 'Save' button to make changes live

mainEntity.name: What's the best way to change my Shopify product order to make more money?

acceptedAnswer.text: The easiest and often most effective way is to set the collection order to 'Best selling.' It uses social proof to sell for you, showing all customers what's popular. This improves the experience and usually leads to more sales without you having to do anything else.

mainEntity.name: Can I move all my discounted stuff to the front?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yep. Just change the product order in that collection to 'Manually.' It's the perfect way to highlight items with a special price or discount at the very top. It definitely has a positive impact on sales.

mainEntity.name: Does the order really matter if I have tons of products?

acceptedAnswer.text: Absolutely. Maybe even more so. With a huge number of products, nobody is going to scroll through everything. Manually sorting is a nightmare, so using automated sorting by price or best-selling is the best way to make your store easy to navigate and help customers find what they want without getting overwhelmed.
